p: The TFC of C. intybus extracts was determined spectrophotometrically using AlCl 3 as a color reagent. In summary, 10 mL of each extract were diluted to 25 mL using methanol, 5 mL were mixed with sodium acetate (5.0 mL, 100 g/L), aluminium chloride (3.0 mL, 25 g/L), and further diluted with methanol up to 25 mL in a calibrated flask [ 82]. The absorbance was measured at 430 nm and the results were expressed as rutin equivalents (RE)/g dry plant material (R 2 = 0.999). All experiments were realized in triplicate.
